TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IQueryProvider

summary.span: Defines methods to create and execute queries that are described by an object.

span.span: Defines methods to create and execute queries that are described by an object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks El interfaz está diseñada para la implementación en los proveedores de consultas.The interface is intended for implementation by query providers. Para obtener más información sobre cómo crear su propio proveedor LINQ, vea [LINQ: compilar un proveedor IQueryable](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=112370) en los Blogs de MSDN.For more information about how to create your own LINQ provider, see [LINQ: Building an IQueryable Provider](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=112370) on MSDN Blogs.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Linq.IQueryable CreateQuery(class System.Linq.Expressions.Expression expression) cil managed

param.name: expression
param.span: An expression tree that represents a [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] query.

span.span: An expression tree that represents a [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] query.

summary.span: Constructs an object that can evaluate the query represented by a specified expression tree.

span.span: Constructs an object that can evaluate the query represented by a specified expression tree.

returns.span: An that can evaluate the query represented by the specified expression tree.

span.span: An that can evaluate the query represented by the specified expression tree.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > El propiedad devuelto del es igual al objeto `expression`.The property of the returned object is equal to `expression`. El método se utiliza para crear nuevos objetos, dado un árbol de expresión.The method is used to create new objects, given an expression tree. La consulta representada por el objeto devuelto se asocia con un proveedor LINQ concreto.The query that is represented by the returned object is associated with a specific LINQ provider. Algunos de los métodos de operador de consulta estándar definidos en , tales como y , llame a este método.Several of the standard query operator methods defined in , such as and , call this method. Pasa un que representa un [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] consulta.They pass it a that represents a [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] query.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > El propiedad devuelto del es igual al objeto `expression`.The property of the returned object is equal to `expression`. El método se utiliza para crear nuevos objetos, dado un árbol de expresión.The method is used to create new objects, given an expression tree. La consulta representada por el objeto devuelto se asocia con un proveedor LINQ concreto.The query that is represented by the returned object is associated with a specific LINQ provider. La mayoría de los métodos de operador de consulta estándar que devuelven resultados enumerables, llame a este método.Most of the standard query operator methods that return enumerable results call this method. Pasa un que representa un [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] consulta.They pass it a that represents a [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] query.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object Execute(class System.Linq.Expressions.Expression expression) cil managed

param.name: expression
param.span: An expression tree that represents a [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] query.

span.span: An expression tree that represents a [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] query.

summary.span: Executes the query represented by a specified expression tree.

span.span: Executes the query represented by a specified expression tree.

returns.span: The value that results from executing the specified query.

span.span: The value that results from executing the specified query.

remarks.format: ## Remarks El método ejecuta consultas que devuelven un único valor (en lugar de una secuencia enumerable de valores).The method executes queries that return a single value (instead of an enumerable sequence of values). Árboles de expresiones que representan las consultas que devuelven resultados enumerables se ejecutan cuando sus asociado se enumera el objeto.Expression trees that represent queries that return enumerable results are executed when their associated object is enumerated.

span.span: The type of the value that results from executing the query.

param.span: An expression tree that represents a [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] query.

span.span: An expression tree that represents a [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] query.

summary.span: Executes the strongly-typed query represented by a specified expression tree.

span.span: Executes the strongly-typed query represented by a specified expression tree.

returns.span: The value that results from executing the specified query.

span.span: The value that results from executing the specified query.

remarks.format: ## Remarks El método ejecuta consultas que devuelven un único valor (en lugar de una secuencia enumerable de valores).The method executes queries that return a single value (instead of an enumerable sequence of values). Árboles de expresiones que representan las consultas que devuelven resultados enumerables se ejecutan cuando el se enumera el objeto que contiene el árbol de expresión.Expression trees that represent queries that return enumerable results are executed when the object that contains the expression tree is enumerated. El métodos de operador de consulta estándar que devuelven singleton resultados llamada .The standard query operator methods that return singleton results call . Pasa un que representa un [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] consulta.They pass it a that represents a [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] query.
